front.title: Introduction of Olive and Grid Delivery

abstract.t: This draft briefly introduces Olive distributed media platform and Grid Delivery solution. Olive platform, which is built by ETRI, provides live peer-to-peer streaming service. Grid Delivery solution, which is built by Peering Portal, is one of the most popular Peer-to- Peer solutions for VoD, AoD, live streaming, and file download service in Korea.
